Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it could work even with a non-random matchup using a commitment round

Author: jl777c#5810
Content:
0. match up with someone
1. commit to an amount and post the hash of it (salted)
2. wait for both commits
3. reveal (verify both hashes, noncompliance is automatic loss)
